# Aiki

> Aiki is a durable execution platform. Write async workflows that survive crashes, retry on failure, and coordinate across systems. Define workflows with tasks, sleeps, events, and child workflows.

## Docs

- [README](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/README.md): Overview and quick start
- [Workflows](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/core-concepts/workflows.md): Define durable workflows with versioning, retries, and child workflows
- [Tasks](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/core-concepts/tasks.md): Create idempotent task units with automatic retries
- [Workers](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/core-concepts/workers.md): Execute workflows with horizontal scaling
- [Client](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/core-concepts/client.md): Connect to Aiki server and start workflows
- [Events](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/core-concepts/events.md): Wait for external signals with typed events

## Guides

- [Determinism](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/guides/determinism.md): Writing deterministic workflows
- [Retry Strategies](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/guides/retry-strategies.md): Configure retry behavior
- [Reference IDs](https://github.com/aikirun/aiki/blob/main/docs/guides/reference-ids.md): Deduplication and idempotency

## Packages

- [@aikirun/workflow](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aikirun/workflow): Workflow SDK
- [@aikirun/task](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aikirun/task): Task SDK
- [@aikirun/client](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aikirun/client): Client SDK
- [@aikirun/worker](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aikirun/worker): Worker SDK
